title: fieldInfo
description: Defines how a field in the dataset participates (or does not participate) in a popup window.

fieldName.description: A string containing the field name as defined by the service. Anywhere that a fieldname is referenced as {field-name} in popupInfo, an Arcade expression can also be referenced as{expression/}`.

label.description: A string containing the field alias. This can be overridden by the web map author. Not applicable to Arcade expressions as title is used instead.

isEditable.description: A Boolean determining whether users can edit this field. Not applicable to Arcade expressions.

visible.description: A Boolean determining whether the field is visible in the popup window.
